video_description: A video review of the Amazon Kindle Fire Android tablet and ebook reader. Check out Lisa's full written review here: http://www.mobiletechreview.com/tablets/Kindle-Fire.htm This is Amazon's first color LCD ebook reader and more. Underneath it runs Android 2.3, but you'd never know it because Amazon has customized it with shelves and shopping for Kindle books, Amazon videos, Amazon MP3 and Android apps from their store. It sells for $199 and has a 7" IPS display, 1GHz dual core CPU and 8GB storage.
